title: Morgan Stanley, Blackstone, AIG, NortonLifeLock: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: AMC Entertainment fell in premarket trading, putting the favorite of Reddit traders on course to extend a recent slide
body: Futures are down ahead of a second day of testimony from Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell on Capitol Hill. New jobless claims fell to 360,000 last week from 386,000 the prior week. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Thursday’s trading action.
